name: Eggventure (Cammin)
description:
You want to celebrate the best Easter possible, so you need to have all the eggs!

Click on the eggs to collect them. After collecting enough, you can buy a basket, or activate prestige. Collect enough eggs to win the game.

Game made for week 9 of my Rapid Prototyping class.

Topic: Games as a past-time

Theme: Easter

Constraints: Must have a type of currency, Must have an Easter egg.
